title: The Faces!
author: JGray
text:
Those faces! Let me tell you! Keith really went all-out with the facial expressions this page.

So, she picked the Hangman. Since she can't go investigate directly, Chrys has decided to see if dad left a clue in one of his hidey-holes. Maybe her dad's paranoia will prove useful?

And, of course, we've got a bit of flirting going on here.

Next week we return to a M/Th schedule! Thank you so much for making that happen!

replies.author: Jasae Bushae*Guest*
replies.text: If I might ask, what happened to the golden dames project? http://goldendames.com/

replies.author: KEZ*Guest*
replies.text: Hey J! Please check your email for some important messages from SF <3
